input.prompt: Extract information about the Dockerfile structure and deployment configuration for this MCP server project. Focus on: 1) Base image used, 2) Dependencies installation, 3) File copying patterns, 4) Entry point configuration

version = "0.1.0"
description = "Add your description here"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.12"
dependencies = [
    "httpx>=0.28.1",
    "mcp>=1.11.0",
    "python-dotenv>=1.1.1",

    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
]

file.content:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
StealthMole MCP Server 실행 스크립트
"""

import os
import sys

# 현재 디렉토리를 Python 경로에 추가
current_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
if current_dir not in sys.path:
    sys.path.insert(0, current_dir)

# 서버 실행
from src.server import main

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

input.content:
FROM python:3.12-slim

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install system dependencies if needed
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    gcc \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Copy dependency files
COPY pyproject.toml uv.lock ./

# Install uv package manager and dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir uv && \
    uv pip install --system --no-cache -r pyproject.toml

# Copy application code
COPY . .

# Set environment variables
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
ENV PYTHONPATH=/app

# Run the MCP server
CMD ["python", "run_server.py"]

toolUseResult.content:
FROM python:3.12-slim

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install system dependencies if needed
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    gcc \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Copy dependency files
COPY pyproject.toml uv.lock ./

# Install uv package manager and dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir uv && \
    uv pip install --system --no-cache -r pyproject.toml

# Copy application code
COPY . .

# Set environment variables
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
ENV PYTHONPATH=/app

# Run the MCP server
CMD ["python", "run_server.py"]

content.text:
Dockerfile과 .dockerignore 파일을 생성했습니다. 

Dockerfile은 Python 3.12 기반으로 만들어졌으며, uv 패키지 매니저를 사용하여 의존성을 설치합니다. MCP 서버 배포에 최적화되어 있습니다.

빌드 및 실행 명령어:
```bash
# 이미지 빌드
docker build -t mole-mcp-server .

# 컨테이너 실행 (환경변수 필요)
docker run -e STEALTHMOLE_API_KEY=your_api_key mole-mcp-server
```
